snippet: ALLENTUCK--Professor Jack, died on Friday, February 5th peacefully in his sleep. He was a nuclear physicist who did global nuclear power plant safety inspections the world over. He was a Professor of Electrical Engineering and received undergraduate degrees from CCNY, and Post Graduate degrees from Columbia University, New York City, NY. He retired from Brookhaven Laboratories where he was employed for more than three decades. He is survived by his wife, Marcia Epstein Allentuck, a daughter Isa, several grandchildren, three nephews and numerous grand-nieces and nephews. He was interred at Mt. Lebanon Cemetery in Glendale, NY. 1/3

He retired from Brookhaven Laboratories where he was employed for more than three decades. He is survived by his wife, Marcia Epstein Allentuck, a daughter Isa, several grandchildren, three nephews and numerous grand-nieces and nephews. He was interred at Mt. Lebanon Cemetery in Glendale, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ALLENTUCK, PROFESSOR JACK
